name: cb-configurator
description: Replaces gendered dance terminology on the Caller's Box website with gender-neutral alternatives.

scripts.build:safari: xcrun safari-web-extension-packager extension/ --project-location safari/ --app-name "Caller's Box Configurator" --bundle-identifier com.chromamine.callersboxconfigurator --swift --no-open --no-prompt --force && find safari/ -type f \( -name '*.swift' -o -name '*.html' -o -name '*.plist' -o -name '*.storyboard' -o -name '*.xib' -o -name '*.strings' \) -exec sed -i '' "s/'/'/g" {} +
